A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was thoroughly disappointed with what they did to Luke Skywalkers legacy in this film. Luke was willing to die for Vader\, but in this film he was willing to murder a child in their sleep? It doesn't make sense. My pet peeves also include \"Laser Sword\" and WWII style bombers in space. And seriously how did the bombs fall if there is no gravity in space. I'm a Star Wars fan through and through\, but that was ridiculous.
